title: Split Two Strings to Make Palindrome
content: You are given two strings and of the same length. Choose an index and split both strings at the same index, splitting into two strings: and where , and splitting into two strings: and where . Check if or forms a palindrome. When you split a string into and , either or is allowed to be empty. For example, if , then , , , and are valid splits. Return if it is possible to form a palindrome string, otherwise return . Notice that denotes the concatenation of strings and . and consist of lowercase English letters
